DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and effectiveness of IDP-115 in treating patients with rosacea.
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Evaluating the Safety and Efficacy of IDP-115 in Patients With Rosacea
DOC.criteria: Presence of facial rosacea Presence of inflammatory lesions Dermatological conditions of the face that could interfere with clinical evaluations Known history of photosensitivity disorders (such as lupus erythematosus or polymorphous light eruption) Female subjects who are pregnant, nursing, planning a pregnancy, or become pregnant during the study
